_sText: this is a zm map based on the game penumbra which is set in an abandoned mining shaft way below ground. this map has: 72 spawnpoints 3 secrets optimised for better fps a surprise around the 2 minute mark ;) the surprise is that when the round have been going for 3 minutes the light turns out! :O dont worry though it wont be completely dark. there is some emergency lights so you still can find your way around. and theres also your flashlight ;) anyways feel free to download comment and assess :D Changes in extended added an extra section with more camp and cade spots. this section being based around the kennels in penumbra black plague. added an extra secret added 1 more camp spot modified a few spots
